title: Anyone experiencing ping like lag with normal ping?
body: I've been feeling this recently and its ruining some of my games

replies.body:
It sounds like there might be some connection issues going on to cause that ping issue. We have a [connection guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664) that provides a great start to troubleshooting what could be causing that lag during your games. Be sure to go over all the steps to narrow down the issue as much as possible. :)

If you're still experiencing issues with your ping, [send a ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) to our Tech team and we can assist further!
